The reason twitter scam accounts use ethereum and not bitcoin is because ethereum users are used to sending eth to contract addresses in return for tokens/eth. It's part of the normal eth UI flow. Send first, then receive after. Makes it ideal for impersonation/giveaway scams.

PSA: Bitcoin and Bitcoin Core are two different things. Bitcoin Core is an *implementation* of Bitcoin - one of quite a few options. If it were to change the protocol rules without community support, it would become an altcoin, and Bitcoin itself would not change.
